name: Logging Producer
helpText: Ending component of the flow, or a route in the flow. This type of producer logs all data passed to it. Payload in: Any java Object. Process: call toString on the supplied payload, output the results to a log. Payload out: N/A

componentName.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow.

description.helpText: A more detailed description of the component that may assist in support.

configuredResourceId.helpText: An ID used to uniquely identify this component, which is then used as a key for configuration.

replacementText.helpText: Replace the matching text with the following string.

regExpPattern.helpText: Only display logs matching this text.
